charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) POSSESSION OF FIREARM BY CONVICTED FELON [ 5:00-mx-5074 ]

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:922(g)(1) POSSESSION OF FIREARM BY CONVICTED FE

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for 188 months; this sentence is to run consecutively to the state sentence that the deft is currently serving (Stark Court Case #2000CR0831); deft is remanded to the custody of the U.S.Marshal; Supervised Release for 3 years; deft to participate in outpatient drug/alcohol treatment program; deft to pay $300.00 special assessment.
